SELECT student.*,student_select_course.* FROM student,student_select_course WHERE
student_select_course.tsc_id=#{tscId} AND
student_select_course.ct_id=#{ctId} AND
student.s_id=student_select_course.s_id

SELECT course.c_id AS cId, course.c_name AS cName, teacher.t_name AS tName, teacher.t_img_src AS tImgSrc,school.sc_name AS scName, course.c_img_src AS cImgSrc FROM student_select_course, course, teacher, school, teacher_select_course WHERE student_select_course.s_id = #{sId} AND teacher_select_course.tsc_id = student_select_course.tsc_id AND course.c_id = teacher_select_course.c_id AND school.sc_id = course.sc_id AND teacher.t_id = teacher_select_course.t_id UNION SELECT class_create.ct_id AS cId, class_create.ct_name AS cName, teacher.t_name AS tName, teacher.t_img_src AS tImgSrc,"未设置学院归属" AS scName, class_create.ct_img_src AS cImgSrc FROM student_select_course, teacher, class_create WHERE student_select_course.s_id = #{sId} AND student_select_course.ct_id = class_create.ct_id AND teacher.t_id = class_create.t_id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM student_select_course, publish_work WHERE publish_work.pw_id = #{pwId} AND (publish_work.ct_id = student_select_course.ct_id OR publish_work.tsc_id = student_select_course.tsc_id)

SELECT student.s_name AS sName, student.s_id AS sId, student.s_img_src AS sImgSrc FROM student, student_select_course WHERE student_select_course.ct_id = #{cId} AND student_select_course.s_id = student.s_id UNION SELECT student.s_name AS sName, student.s_id AS sId, student.s_img_src AS sImgSrc FROM student, teacher_select_course, student_select_course WHERE teacher_select_course.c_id = #{cId} AND teacher_select_course.tsc_id = student_select_course.tsc_id AND student_select_course.s_id = student.s_id ORDER BY sId ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

SELECT student.*,student_select_course.* FROM student,student_select_course WHERE student_select_course.tsc_id=#{cId} AND student.s_id=student_select_course.s_id UNION SELECT student.*,student_select_course.* FROM student,student_select_course WHERE student_select_course.ct_id=#{cId} AND student.s_id=student_select_course.s_id limit #{start},#{end}
